member.name: POINTER_DEVICE_CURSOR_TYPE

member.name: POINTER_DEVICE_CURSOR_TYPE.POINTER_DEVICE_CURSOR_TYPE_MAX
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. You should not use this value.
